seo.title: Mid-career coaching to realign work and life | SustainSage
seo.description: ICF-aligned coaching for experienced professionals recalibrating impact, wellbeing, and meaning.

hero.title: Realign mid-career decisions with the life you want now.
hero.subtitle: Pause, re-evaluate, and design experiments that honour your experience and evolving values.

who.title: Who this is for
items: You’re 10–20 years into your career and questioning what success looks like now.
You’re balancing leadership responsibilities with caregiving or health needs.
You’re considering a sabbatical, portfolio work, or a values-led pivot.
You feel stuck between staying for stability and leaving for purpose.

what.title: What we work on
items: Clarifying non-negotiables across money, time, health, and relationships.
Designing experiments to test new roles, industries, or business models.
Renegotiating boundaries, workload, and influence with stakeholders.
Building narratives that communicate your evolving direction with confidence.

how.title: How it works
how.description: A reflective container to steady the middle stretch of your career.
items: Six 60-minute Zoom sessions over 3–4 months, with options to extend if needed.
Session agendas are co-designed around live decisions, energy levels, and experiments.
Between-session reflection via shared notes or Loom updates when momentum matters.
We support clarity and accountability while acknowledging outcomes depend on your context.

items.title: Designing a sabbatical-friendly exit
items.description: We mapped finances, stakeholder conversations, and a phased handover so a director could take three months off without burning bridges.

items.title: Shifting from corporate to mission-led work
items.description: A senior manager explored social impact roles, prototyped board contributions, and reframed leadership stories for purpose-driven organisations.

items.title: Rebalancing after a health scare
items.description: We rebuilt workload agreements, reset travel expectations, and designed wellbeing rituals that fit a demanding regional role.

expect.title: What you can expect
items: Clarity on what matters now and how to articulate it.
Practical experiments that reduce risk while you explore options.
Stronger boundaries that protect capacity without harming relationships.
Renewed confidence to make decisions aligned with your values.

ethics.title: Ethics & fit
items: ICF commitments to confidentiality whether you self-fund or have employer support.
We never push hustle narratives; your pace and capacity lead our work.
We point you to therapy, legal, or financial advice when specialised expertise is needed.
No affiliate fees or hidden agendas—recommendations stay client-centred.

cta.title: Want space to redesign the middle of your career?
cta.body: Book a 20-minute chat to see whether this partnership supports the decisions ahead.
